title: Railway Centenary Exhibition
creator_credit: Documentary Films of India, M. Bhavnani and Jagat Murari
brief_description: The Rialway Centenary Exhibition was organised in Delhi as a fitting memorial to the saga of Indian railways. Glimpses of the manifold achievements of Indian railways, including the Chittaranjan Locomotive Workshops, the Integral Coach Factory near Madras and TELCO at Jamshedpur.
